actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may furnish outpatient dental services and treatment for non-service-connected disability to any war veteran who has a service-connected disability of 80 per centum or more.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to provide outpatient dental services to any war veteran with an 80 percent or more service-connected disability.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may furnish outpatient dental services and treatment for non-service-connected disability to any war veteran who has a service-connected disability of 80 per centum or more.
